title: 6.AP.1
text: The student will apply computational thinking to identify patterns, make use of decomposition to break down problems or processes into sub-components, and design algorithms.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Identify patterns and repeated steps in an algorithm, problem, or process.
Decompose an algorithm, problem, or process into sub-components.
Abstract relevant information to identify essential details.
Design algorithms using abstraction to accomplish a task or express a computational process.
